JIRI STEPANEK

Long story short, my name is Jiri Stepanek and I’m 18 years old. Although I still haven't finished high school, I run a small agency called PalmMedia. I personally specialize in social media marketing and web development. I spent most of my time working for clients, in the GYM or just playing with my cat.
